title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Noise sensor
description: The uCIFI noise sensor reports a noise measurement in decibel. It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the noise sensor and some specific alarms resulting from noise analysis by the device.. objectID:'3433'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3433:1.1'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.1'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Noise sensor`.

Gunshot detected.description: Property. Set to True when a gunshot is detected.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Abnormal noise detected.description: Property. Set to True when an abnormal noise is detected.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Sensor Value.description: Property. Last or current measured value from the Sensor.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Minimum measured value.description: Property. Minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.. resourceID:'4'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'dB'.

Maximum measured value.description: Property. Maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'dB'.

Minimum range value.description: Property. Minimum value that can be measured by the sensor.. resourceID:'6'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'dB'.

Maximum range value.description: Property. Maximum value that can be measured by the sensor.. resourceID:'7'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'dB'.

Reset min and max values.description: Property. Reset the min and max measured values to current value. [Executable resource]. resourceID:'8'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5518'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Fractional Timestamp.description: Property. Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).. resourceID:'6050'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

Measurement Quality Indicator.description: Property. Measurement quality indicator reported by a smart sensor. 0: UNCHECKED No quality checks were done because they do not exist or can not be applied. 1: REJECTED WITH CERTAINTY The measured value is invalid. 2: REJECTED WITH PROBABILITY The measured value is likely invalid. 3: ACCEPTED BUT SUSPICIOUS The measured value is likely OK. 4: ACCEPTED The measured value is OK. 5-15: Reserved for future extensions. 16-23: Vendor specific measurement quality.. resourceID:'6042'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Measurement Quality Level.description: Property. Measurement quality level reported by a smart sensor. Quality level 100 means that the measurement has fully passed quality check algorithms. Smaller quality levels mean that quality has decreased and the measurement has only partially passed quality check algorithms. The smaller the quality level, the more caution should be used by the application when using the measurement. When the quality level is 0 it means that the measurement should certainly be rejected.. resourceID:'6049'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
